title: Palestinians flee IDF attacks on Gaza City as Israelis protest occupation plan
summary: Israeli bombardment has created a "catastrophic" situation in the city's Zeitoun neighbourhood, the city's Hamas-run authority says.

title: New Orleans mayor and bodyguard lover charged with fraud and corruption
summary: Prosecutors accuse LaToya Cantrell of conspiring with her protection cop to pay him for personal liasons.

title: German Breweries Are Forced to Adapt as Gen Z Goes Alkoholfrei
summary: Over the course of its 172-year-history, the Lang-Bräu brewery in the north of Bavaria has weathered two world wars and the fall of the Iron Curtain, whose defenses once stood less than thirty minutes away. But money troubles in recent years proved more than the small operation could handle. Facing €12 million ($13.9 million) in costs for much-needed upgrades, the owners decided last summer to shut everything down.
